name: 3D Rescue Racer Traffic Rush - Ambulance, Fire Truck Police Car and Emergency Vehicles: FREE GAME
name_original: 3D Rescue Racer Traffic Rush - Ambulance, Fire Truck Police Car and Emergency Vehicles: FREE GAME
description:
There has been a horrible accident on the highway. Respond to it with your emergency vehicle. Race through traffic, stop at the accident and pick up victims. Deliver many people to the hospital for a coin multiplier bonus. Fun, frantic action that will keep you on the edge of your seat all day. Become a rescue hero today!

Features
• 5 Different Emergency Vehicles to use
• Awesome 3D graphics
• Nitro Boost, coin magnets and other powerups
• Two different City environments to drive through

Due to 3D graphics, this game may not run on older devices and some iPod Touch units that only have 256mb of ram.

Note on Ads: Due to Apple's policy, we are not able to remove ads based on a coin purchase at this time. We may provide a better solution in an update.
